name: Wab.Exe Unusual Parent Or Child Processes
description: Detects unusual parent or children of the wab.exe (Windows Contacts) process as seen being used with bumblebee activity
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:(*\\WmiPrvSE.exe OR *\\svchost.exe OR *\\dllhost.exe) AND process.executable:*\\wab.exe) OR process.parent.executable:*\\wab.exe)`
